itunes:title: S5, E4: Dr. Jeri Fitzpatrick
title: S5, E4: Dr. Jeri Fitzpatrick
itunes:author: That Sounds Fun Network
description:
This week on the podcast, we’ve got one of our favorite and one of Nashville’s most respected psychiatrists, Dr. Jeri Fitzpatrick. We can’t wait for you to listen in on this conversation around what she’s seeing in her offices these days, what she believes kids need from their parents to support their mental health and why and when medication might be important.

Connect with David, Sissy, and Melissa at raisingboysandgirls.com.


A special thank you to our partners of this week's episode:

  • Abide - Download Abide Sleep and Pray Meditation today and text my promo code RBG to 22433 today to get 25% off!
  • Pair Eyewear - Go to paireyewear.com/raisingboysandgirls for 15% off your first purchase.
  • Explorer Bible for Kids - Learn more at explorerbibleforkids.com. Buy your copy today from Lifeway.com and get 50% off using code RBG.
